title: WP_REST_API_Application_Password
description: A user application password in a REST API context.

uuid.description: The unique identifier for the application password.

app_id.description: A UUID provided by the application to uniquely identify it. It is recommended to use an UUID v5 with the URL or DNS namespace.

name.description: The name of the application password.

password.description: The generated password. Only available after adding an application.

created.description: The GMT date the application password was created.

last_used.description: The GMT date the application password was last used.

last_ip.description: The IP address the application password was last used by.
